downTimeAlert.heading: Notice
downTimeAlert.subheading: App is down for maintenance. We apologize for any inconvenience. Your understanding is appreciated.

apiFailAlert.heading: Notice
apiFailAlert.subheading: There is some technical issue. We are looking into it. Apologies for the inconvenience. Please keep in touch.

mailBox.heading: Report to us
mailBox.subject: App is unable to fetch data

updateAlert.heading: Update
updateAlert.subheading: We have a new update for you. Please update the app to get the latest features and bug fixes.
